titles.title: A bill to authorize appropriations for the Federal Election Commission for fiscal year 1988.

calendar.text: Committee on Rules ordered to be reported an original measure.

action.text: Committee on Rules. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Ford. With written report No. 100-52.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 112.

bill.summary: 5/6/1987--Introduced. Amends the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to authorize appropriations for the Federal Election Commission for FY 1988.
